price: Esse Paraíso é o que faremos herdar a quem é piedoso, de Nossos servos.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِي نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: til'ka al-janatu allatī nūrithu min ʿibādinā man kāna taqiyyan
